short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome-SEAN is an implementation of the research work by LCS2, IIITD based on Twitter Fake News Detection.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome-SEAN is an implementation of the research work by LCS2, IIITD based on Twitter Fake News Detection. This extension demonstrates the working of the model Cross-SEAN which detects fake news on Twitter by employing an end-to-end mechanism.

When the user clicks on the Chrome-SEAN icon, it automatically recognises if a Tweet Status is present on the userâ€™s screen and takes the tweet ID as input.

The tweet passes through our Deep Learning model, predicting label (Fake/Non-Fake) along with the confidence score. Moreover, the user has an option of Reporting a tweet fake or genuine in case there is a contradiction in opinion, this helps us improve our model.
